rules_text:
The Land Beneath the Sea enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{4}{U}, {T}: Transform The Land Beneath the Sea. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
When this land transforms into Lantalia, draw a card.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
flavor_text2: [i]Lantalia's champions are charged with protecting the sea and the sky from those who would pollute them.[/i]
